69618.affected_area: West Vancouver (Hollyburn, Dundarave, West Bay, British Properties, Cedardale, Ambleside, Sentinel Hill, Park Royal, Westmount, & Norgate)
69618.summary: Some customers in the Hollyburn, Dundarave, West Bay, British Properties, Cedardale, Ambleside, Sentinel Hill, Park Royal, Westmount, & Norgate areas of West Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
